UPDATE applet_package SET package_recommendation = ( SELECT a.countForPackage FROM (SELECT package_id AS packageId,count(*) AS countForPackage FROM applet_good WHERE del_flag = 0 AND good_status IN (3,4,7,8) GROUP BY package_id) a WHERE package_id = packageId )
mapper.select: select a.id,a. package_id,a. lab_code,a. package_name,a. package_logo,a. package_info,a. package_label,a. package_recommendation,a. package_priority,a. package_catalog_id,a. package_message,a. package_purpose_id,a. package_population_id,a. population_name,a. package_source_id,a. package_source_name,a. package_remark,a. package_prime_price,a. package_current_price,a. package_status,a. package_collect_type,a. package_sample_pic,a. package_step,a. package_report_type,a. package_report_charge,a. package_report_time,a. report_time_desc,a. sample_type_name,a. sample_type,a. package_special_requirement,a. package_equipment,a. storage_condition,a. del_flag,a. create_date,a. update_date,a. test_object_id,a. clinical_significance,a. lab_group,a. price_code,a. package_type,b.recommend_status from applet_package a,applet_im_recommend_list_item b where a.package_id = b.package_no and b.im_recommend_list_id = #{imRecommendListId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.del_flag = 0 and a.del_flag = 0 and a.package_type = 0
